file.name: request_body_pass_disabled_openAPI.yaml
file.content:
openapi: "3.0.0"
info:
  version: 1.0.0
  title: requestBodyPassDisabledApi
  license:
    name: MIT
servers:
  - url: http://mockBackend:2383/v2
x-wso2-basePath: /bodyPassDisable/1.0.0
x-wso2-pass-request-payload-to-enforcer: false # disables request body passing
paths:
  /echo:
    post:
      summary: Provides echo response
      responses:
        '200':
          description: successful operation
    security:
      - petstore_auth: [ ]
components:
  securitySchemes:
    petstore_auth:
      type: oauth2
      authorizationUrl: 'http://mockBackend:2380/oauth/authorize'
      flow: implicit
      scopes:
        'read:pets': read your pets
        'write:pets': modify pets in your account
  schemas:
    Data:
      type: object
      required:
        - id
        - name
      properties:
        id:
          type: integer
          format: int64
        name:
          type: string
        tag:
          type: string
